title: Implement Risk Score Calculator
description: Create a utility function to aggregate scores based on user answers as they progress.

title: Add loading states and skeleton screens
description: Create loading indicators for transitions, skeleton screens for content loading, and proper loading states for async operations.

title: Add quiz resume functionality
description: Detect saved quiz state on load and show option to resume or start fresh. Implement 'Continue where you left off' UI with progress indicator.

title: Implement form validation and error handling
description: Add validation for all inputs, show clear error messages, prevent submission with missing required fields, handle network errors gracefully.

title: Design JSON schema for quiz questions and logic
description: Define the JSON structure for questions, answer choices, conditional logic rules, and risk score mappings. Create example schema with 5-10 sample questions covering different scenarios from PRD.

title: Handle edge cases for persistence
description: Handle corrupt data, storage quota exceeded, cleared storage, schema version mismatches. Gracefully fallback to fresh state with user notification.

title: Implement form navigation system (next/back)
description: Build navigation controls that respect conditional logic, handle early exits when no more relevant questions, validate answers before proceeding, and track progress.

title: Implement Question Input Components
description: Build reusable Radio (single-choice) and Checkbox (multi-select) components compatible with the engine.

title: Setup Next.js project with Tailwind, Framer Motion, and Zustand
description: Initialize Next.js (App Router), install and configure Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion for animations, and Zustand for state management. Setup basic project structure.

title: Define Quiz JSON Schema
description: Create a structured JSON file (or TypeScript types) to define questions, options, and branching logic rules.

title: Build Lead Capture Form
description: Create the upfront gating form for Name, Email, and Phone with basic validation.

title: Build landing page with intro and CTA
description: Create landing page with brief introduction about the risk assessment, value proposition, and 'Start Assessment' button. Use Tailwind for modern, professional design.

title: End-to-end integration and testing
description: Test complete user flow from landing to completion. Verify all features work together: navigation, logic, scoring, persistence, lead capture. Fix integration bugs.

title: Implement Dynamic CTA
description: Change the final CTA text and link based on the user's highest identified risk area.

title: Build conditional logic evaluator engine
description: Implement JavaScript logic evaluator that processes JSON-based rules (AND/OR conditions) to determine which questions to show based on previous answers. Support complex multi-condition logic.

title: Create sample quiz data with realistic scenarios
description: Build comprehensive sample quiz JSON with 15-20 questions covering home insurance scenarios: property type, occupancy, security, hazards, etc. Include varied branching logic.

title: Implement risk calculation engine
description: Build calculator that takes quiz answers and computes risk scores for each category using the weighting model. Return structured risk profile with percentages/scores per category.

title: Add smooth slide transitions with Framer Motion
description: Implement vertical/horizontal slide animations between questions using Framer Motion. Add progress indicator. Ensure smooth UX with proper exit/enter animations.

title: Build Completion Modal & Simulation
description: Create the success modal showing data has been sent and log the final payload to the console.

title: Create completion success modal
description: Build modal that appears after submission confirming data was sent. Include thank you message and next steps information. Add close/dismiss functionality.

title: Implement dynamic CTA based on highest risk
description: Create logic to determine highest risk category and display contextual CTA (e.g., 'Secure your Home' for high theft risk). Include button that triggers completion flow.

title: Build Landing Page
description: Create a conversion-focused landing page with a clear 'Start Assessment' CTA.

title: Add accessibility improvements (WCAG 2.1)
description: Implement keyboard navigation, ARIA labels, focus management, screen reader support. Ensure proper color contrast and semantic HTML.

title: Define Risk Weighting Schema
description: Map answer choices to specific risk scores (Fire, Legal, Theft, etc.) in the JSON schema.

title: Implement Lead Gating Logic
description: Ensure users cannot skip to the quiz without completing the lead capture form.

title: Configure Tailwind and Framer Motion
description: Setup Tailwind theme and basic Framer Motion animation presets for question transitions.

title: Create reusable Question component with multiple input types
description: Build Question component that renders different input types: single-choice (radio), multi-select (checkbox). Include proper styling with Tailwind and focus states.

title: Implement LocalStorage persistence layer
description: Create utility functions to save/load quiz state to LocalStorage. Include serialization/deserialization with proper error handling. Auto-save on each answer.

title: Create visual gauge/progress bar components
description: Build reusable gauge components to display risk scores visually. Use Tailwind for styling with color gradients (green/yellow/red). Animate on mount.

title: Implement Zustand store for quiz state management
description: Create Zustand store to manage current question index, answers, quiz progress, and navigation state. Include actions for updating answers, navigating, and resetting quiz.

title: Build Core Form Engine
description: Implement the renderer that iterates through the JSON schema, manages 'current question' state, and handles 'Next' navigation.

title: Generate Data Payload for Broker
description: Develop the logic to curate a summary of risks and key facts into a final JSON payload.

title: Build Risk Profile Gauges
description: Create interactive visual gauges or progress bars to represent risk levels in different categories.

title: Implement Branching Logic Evaluator
description: Add support for multi-condition boolean logic (e.g., IF Q1=='Yes' AND Q2=='Commercial' THEN show Q3).

title: Design risk scoring data model and weights
description: Define risk categories (Fire, Legal, Theft, etc.) and create mapping of answer choices to risk score modifiers. Document weighting logic (e.g., 'Pitched Roof' -> +10% Fire coverage).

title: Implement fake delivery with console logging
description: Create 'Send to Broker' function that logs curated summary to console (prototype mode). Add 2-second delay to simulate API call.

title: Build results page with risk visualization
description: Create results page that displays all risk gauges, summary text for each category, and curated insights. Show top 3 risk areas prominently.

title: Implement curated data summary generator
description: Create utility that transforms raw quiz answers into a curated summary including lead info, risk profile, key facts, and top insights. Format for easy broker consumption.

title: Setup project architecture and folder structure
description: Organize folders for components, utils, types, schemas. Create barrel exports, setup path aliases. Document architecture decisions.

title: Initialize Zustand state management and persistence
description: Set up the core store to handle lead data, quiz progress, and answers. Implement LocalStorage persistence for the store.

title: Setup project structure and core configurations
description: Ensure Next.js App Router is configured, directory structure is ready (components, hooks, lib, data), and basic global styles are set.

title: Implement responsive design for mobile/tablet
description: Ensure quiz works perfectly on mobile, tablet, and desktop. Adjust layouts, font sizes, touch targets. Test on various screen sizes.

title: Create pre-quiz lead capture form
description: Build form to collect Name, Email, and Phone before quiz starts. Include validation, proper input types, and error states. Store in quiz state.

title: Create TypeScript types for quiz schema
description: Define TypeScript interfaces for Question, Answer, LogicRule, RiskScore, and QuizState. Ensure type safety across the application.
